scripts.postclean: npm run uninstall:all && npm run env
scripts.prestart: npm run clean && npm i && npm run setup:monorepo
scripts.start: npx -y npm-run-all setup:stencil setup:angular setup:react setup:vue
scripts.poststart: npx -y npm-run-all build:stencil build:angular build:react build:vue && npm run links
scripts.uninstall:all: npx -y npm-run-all unlink:stencil unlink:angular unlink:react unlink:vue
scripts.link:all: npx -y npm-run-all link:stencil link:angular link:react link:vue
scripts.unlink:angular: npm uninstall --global angular-workspace && npm uninstall --global angular-library
scripts.presetup:stencil: cd $npm_package_config_project/packages && npx -y create-stencil components $npm_package_config_stencil_lib && cd $npm_package_config_stencil_lib && npm i
scripts.postsetup:stencil: npm run setup:stencil:storybook && npm run setup:stencil:extras
scripts.presetup:stencil:extras: echo "Warning: may need to update this script from time to time"
scripts.postsetup:angular: npm run setup:angular:storybook && npm run setup:angular:extras
scripts.presetup:angular:extras: echo "Warning: may need to update this script from time to time"
scripts.prebuild:angular: npm run build:angular:project && npm run build:angular:library
scripts.postbuild:angular: npm run build:angular:extras && npm run link:angular
scripts.setup:react: cd $npm_package_config_project/packages/$npm_package_config_react_lib && npm i react react-dom typescript @types/node @types/react --save-dev
scripts.postsetup:react: npm run setup:react:storybook && npm run setup:react:extras
scripts.presetup:react:extras: echo "Warning: may need to update this script from time to time"
scripts.postbuild:react: npm run build:react:extras && npm run link:react
scripts.postsetup:vue: npm run setup:vue:storybook && npm run setup:vue:extras
scripts.presetup:vue:extras: echo "Warning: may need to update this script from time to time"
scripts.postbuild:vue: npm run build:vue:extras && npm run link:vue
scripts.setup:stencil:storybook: cd $npm_package_config_project/packages/$npm_package_config_stencil_lib && cross-env CI=true npx -y storybook@latest init --type=html --builder=$npm_package_config_sb_builder --disable-telemetry
scripts.setup:angular:storybook: cd $npm_package_config_project/packages/$npm_package_config_ng_proj && cross-env CI=true npx -y storybook@latest init --yes --disable-telemetry
scripts.setup:react:storybook: cd $npm_package_config_project/packages/$npm_package_config_react_lib && cross-env CI=true npx -y storybook@latest init --builder=$npm_package_config_sb_builder --disable-telemetry
scripts.setup:vue:storybook: cd $npm_package_config_project/packages/$npm_package_config_vue_lib && cross-env CI=true npx -y storybook@latest init --builder=$npm_package_config_sb_builder --disable-telemetry
scripts.setup:storybook: npx -y npm-run-all setup:storybook:stencil setup:storybook:angular setup:storybook:react setup:storybook:vue

commands.prewip:angular: npm run uninstall:stencil && npm run uninstall:angular && npx -y rimraf $npm_package_config_project/packages/$npm_package_config_ng_proj
commands.wip:angular: npm run setup:angular && cd $npm_package_config_project/packages/$npm_package_config_stencil_lib && npm run build && npm link
commands.postwip:angular: npm run setup:stencil:extras && npm run wip:build:angular
commands.wip:build:angular: cd $npm_package_config_project/packages/$npm_package_config_ng_proj && npm run build && npx -y -p $npm_package_config_framework_angular ng build $npm_package_config_ng_lib
commands.presetup:tsdx: npm config ls && npx -y rimraf $npm_package_config_project/packages/tsdx-library && npm config set init-author-email=bryan.a.olson@ey.com
commands.setup:tsdx: npm config ls && cd $npm_package_config_project/packages && npx -y tsdx create tsdx-library --template=react-with-storybook
commands.postsetup:tsdx: npm config delete init-author-email && npm config ls
commands.pre-uninstall:all: npx -y npm-run-all --parallel uninstall:stencil uninstall:angular uninstall:react uninstall:vue
commands._start: npx -y npm-run-all setup:stencil setup:angular setup:angular:extras setup:react setup:react:extras setup:vue setup:vue:extras setup:stencil:extras
commands.post-start: npx -y npm-run-all --parallel build:angular build:react build:vue && npm run setup:storybook && npm run links
commands.post-setup:monorepo: cd $npm_package_config_project && git init && git add -A && git commit -m 'Initial commit' && npm install typescript @types/node --save-dev
commands.post_setup:monorepo: cd $npm_package_config_project && npx -y lerna init --packages='packages/*' && npm i && npm install typescript @types/node --save-dev
commands.post-setup:stencil: node .bin/index css2scss && cd $npm_package_config_project && git add -A && git commit -m 'Stencil commit'
commands._setup:stencil:extras: npx -y ncp ./.tmp/files/stencil/stencil.config.ts ./$npm_package_config_project/packages/$npm_package_config_stencil_lib/stencil.config.ts && cd $npm_package_config_project && git add -A && git commit -m 'Stencil update'
commands.post-setup:angular:extras: cd $npm_package_config_project && git add -A && git commit -m 'Angular commit'
commands.post-setup:react: node .bin/index react && cd $npm_package_config_project && git add -A && git commit -m 'React commit'
commands.post-setup:vue: node .bin/index vue && cd $npm_package_config_project && git add -A && git commit -m 'Vue commit'
